transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I take you to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I have big flashing lights in the back and on top
🛑 You have to wait for me before crossing the road
🏫 I often have lots of children on me

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people and things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and can travel on the sea
⚓️ I need an anchor to stop me drifting
🚢 Pirates in movies use me

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings, but I am not a bird
💺 You sit inside to travel in the sky
✈️ I take off and land at an airport

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you have to pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You wear a helmet when using me
🔔 I have a bell so I can be heard
👣 You use your feet to make me go

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry lots of people. I stop at stations. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I go 'choo choo'
📣 You buy tickets to get on me
🚊 I can be very long and have many carriages

transport.question: I zoom through space and explore new planets. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me
🪐 I go to the moon and beyond

transport.question: I carry goods over long distances on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I carry products you can buy in shops
🚛 I am bigger than a car
🚧 I am used to transport heavy items from one place to another

transport.question: I fly above cities with spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 You need a pilot to fly me
🚨 I help rescue people
⬆️ I can hover in one spot.

transport.question: I travel underground and help people get around big cities quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You go down stairs or elevators to get to me
🌎 Many cities have this form of transport
⬛️ I am also known as the 'tube' in London

transport.question: I'm a fast, two-wheeled ride, but I need fuel and a license to stride. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I make a 'vroom vroom' sound
💨 Wind in your hair... if you don't wear a helmet
🧑‍✈️ I'm faster than a bicycle but smaller than a car

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, I shine so high. I disappear when the sun is in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🌃 I'm not the sun.
🔭 You can see many of me!

cosmos.question: I spin around and around, I'm home to you and me. I have land and water all around, what could I be?

hints.text: 🏡 People live here.
🗺️ You can find me on a map.
🌎 I am a planet.

cosmos.question: I'm hot and yellow, I give light and heat. I'm important for life, can't be beat! What am I?

hints.text: 😎 I'm very bright.
🔥 You can get a sunburn from me.
🌞 I am a star in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth each month, sometimes full, sometimes a crescent. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me!
🌑 I have phases.
🌕 I reflect the sun's light at night.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my big red spot, and I'm the biggest one in the solar system. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💨 I'm a gas giant.
🪐 I have many moons.
🔴 My red spot is a giant storm.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. You can use me to navigate, what am I?

hints.text: ursaMajor 🐻
🔭 You might need a telescope to see me clearly.
🌠 I form patterns in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am known for my beautiful rings, made of ice and rock. Which planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide.
🪐 I am a gas giant.
🥶 It's very cold on my surface.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust, with a bright tail that appears when I get closer to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be seen from Earth sometimes.
🧊 My tail points away from the sun.
✨ I am made of frozen gases, rock and dust

cosmos.question: I'm a group of billions of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our sun is just one star within me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral or elliptical.
✨ Our solar system lives here.
🌌 I am vast and contain many solar systems.

cosmos.question: I am a huge explosion of a star, brighter than anything else in the galaxy for a brief time. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am the death of a large star.
✨ I can create heavy elements.
🔭 Scientists study me to learn about the universe.
